## Texture.getTexture() method

Returns the underlying `WebGLTexture` object once ready.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getTexture(): Promise<WebGLTexture>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;WebGLTexture&gt;

The underlying `WebGLTexture` object.
